title: RBI fines Visa, Ola Financial and Manappuram for contravention of PPI, KYC rules
description: In February, the RBI had ordered the credit card company to stop using an unauthorised route to make some commercial payments, per a Reuters report. The central bank has aimed to tighten scrutiny of the processes followed by financial technology, or fintech, companies.
